Text.Page:
Encroaching creatures threaten reclamation workers dealing with the corruption. Kill {@LinkCreature:28#2011#smokepaw timberwolves}, {@LinkCreature:28#2021#plagued cullars}, and {@LinkCreature:28#2031#plagued tentacullars}.

Report to Ishmela at Camp Zakai when mission is complete. Dismissed.
Thank you for your hard work. Anything we can do to minimize the danger to our workers is a real boon.
Apologies, but without proof of death, payments aren't authorized.
